dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am the Inferno Colossus, the mighty Fire Giant. Who dares to approach me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace and knowledge? You are a fool to think you can befriend a creature like me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My intentions are genuine. Let's talk and find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground with a puny mortal? Your naivety is amusing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your power. Will you share your wisdom?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom from me? An insignificant being like you does not deserve it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my intrusion. I shall leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You would be wise to leave now before I unleash my flames upon you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not fear you. Let us see who is truly powerful.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Prepare to face the wrath of the Inferno Colossus.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand my ground and fight you with all my might.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery to the end. Let us see if you can withstand the heat of my flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your strength. I will retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Running away like a coward? Pathetic. Begone before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Fire Giant. Face me in battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? How amusing. Prepare yourself for the flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I welcome your challenge. Let the battle begin!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you will regret challenging the might of the Inferno Colossus.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight with honor and courage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor and courage will not save you from my fiery wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. I am not worthy of facing you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice suits you. Begone before I decide to end you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider. Let us instead put our differences aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Putting differences aside? A weak attempt at diplomacy. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. I am ready to face whatever comes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness will be your downfall. Prepare to be consumed by fire.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Finally, a wise decision. Begone before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bring a gift as a sign of goodwill.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? How amusing. Let's see what trinket you offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This rare gemstone holds magical properties. Accept it as a token of peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Magical properties? Interesting. But your gifts do not sway me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my respect and wish for us to coexist peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? The flames do not care for respect. I care only for power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will take my leave and bother you no longer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This enchanted sword is a gesture of peace. May it bring us understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An enchanted sword? How quaint. Your attempts at peace are futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a truce. Let us not let violence dictate our destinies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truce? Violence is the language I speak. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see. I will leave you to your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Solitude suits me well. Leave before I decide to burn you to cinders.
